UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Dimerization and lysine substitution of melittin have differing effects on bacteria
Literature.Author: Matthyssen T, Li W, Holden JA, Lenzo JC, Hadjigol S, O'Brien-Simpson NM

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=10.49±2.65 µM,Chicken erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=1.4±1.14 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=1.28±0.06µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=1.83±1.21µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4.32±0.31µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=7.10±1.68µM),Rat hepatocellular carcinoma H-4-II-E(IC50=3.37±0.08µM)
